text: No Gravity is the second studio album by Barbadian recording artist Shontelle, released on September 21, 2010 by SRC Records. ==Review== No Gravity received mixed reviews. ==Track listing== ==Release history== Region Date Label United States September 21, 2010 SRC Records, Universal Motown United Kingdom October 18, 2010 Universal-Island Records ==Charts== Chart (2010) Peak position US Billboard 200[ "Music Albums, Top 200 Albums & Music Album Charts: 81-100"]. Week of October 09, 2010. Billboard.com 81 ==References== Category:2010 albums Category:Dance albums Category:R&B; albums
title: No Gravity (Shontelle album)
